AI Description: The Nvidia PTX (Parallel Thread Execution) backend for GCC enables the generation of PTX code, which is a low-level parallel thread execution virtual machine and instruction set architecture used by Nvidia GPUs. It allows users to compile and optimize C and C++ code for Nvidia GPUs.
Core Features: Generating Ptx Code For Nvidia Gpus, Compiling & Optimizing C & C++ Code For Gpu Execution
